name: timey-wimey
description: Extension that keeps track of time spent coding per user per project

timeyWimey.inactivityInterval.description: The number of seconds of inactivity before the timer stops

timeyWimey.sessionActiveInterval.description: The number of minutes after which the session is checked for unexpected quits. Longer time means less accurate data but smaller file

timeyWimey.includeInGitIgnore.description: Whether to include your work stats file in the .gitignore file

scripts.pretest: pnpm run compile && pnpm run lint
